participant_1.background:
I keep things to myself instead of speaking my mind.
I love having facial hair.
My left leg hurts me daily.
I love to ride horses.
I hope to retire someday soon.

participant_2.background:
I will try any kind of food once.
I read a lot of poetry.
I like hiking in nature.
I want to learn how to draw.

content.text: Hello! I love riding horses. Do you enjoy any outdoor activities?
Hi! I love hiking in nature. I also like to read poetry.
That's great! I love reading poetry too. What kind of poetry do you like to read?
I like all kinds of poetry, but I especially like romantic poetry.
I love romantic poetry too! I think it's so beautiful. What is your favorite romantic poem?
My favorite romantic poem is "The Love Song of J. Alfred Prufrock" by T.S. Eliot.
That's a great poem! I love the imagery and the way it captures the feeling of unrequited love.
Me too! It's such a beautiful poem.
I'm glad you like it. I'm also a big fan of hiking. What are your favorite places to hike?
I love hiking in the mountains. I live in a state with a lot of beautiful mountains, so I'm lucky to have a lot of great hiking trails to choose from.
That's awesome! I'm jealous. I live in a state with a lot of flat land, so I don't have many mountains to hike.
You should visit our state sometime! We have some of the best hiking trails in the country.
I'll definitely have to check it out!
You won't be disappointed!
I'm sure I won't.
Do you have any other outdoor hobbies?
I love to fish. I used to fish a lot when I was younger, but I haven't been able to do it as much lately.
That's too bad. I love fishing too. It's so relaxing and peaceful.
I know! It's the perfect way to relax and enjoy nature.
Exactly!
I hope I can get back into fishing soon.
I hope so too! It's a great hobby.
